mapper.select: select business_id from place where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into place( cname, ename, type, scale, average_daily_flow, country_code, area_code, city_code, address, zip_code, business_id, create_time ) values ( #{cname}, #{ename}, #{type}, #{scale}, #{averageDailyFlow}, #{countryCode}, #{areaCode}, #{cityCode}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{businessId}, #{createTime} )
